mcq.statement: Who was responsible for reinstating Maratha authority over North India ten years after the Third Battle of Panipat?
mcq.one_liner: Ten years after the Third Battle of Panipat, **Peshwa Madhavrao-I** was responsible for reinstating Maratha authority over North India.
